mapper.update: INSERT ALL INTO memberId (memberIdx) values (member_seq.NEXTVAL) into member (memberIdx,userId,userName,userPwd,tel,zip,addr1,addr2,birth,email,introduce,profile_imageFilename) values (member_seq.NEXTVAL,#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{tel}, #{zip}, #{addr1}, #{addr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduce, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profile_imageFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) select * from dual
mapper.select: SELECT m.memberIdx, membership, userId, userName, userPwd, introduce, profile_imageFilename, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel, zip, addr1, addr2 FROM memberId m LEFT OUTER JOIN member m1 ON m.memberIdx = m1.memberIdx WHERE m.memberIdx = #{memberIdx}
